mention.text: a demonstration of international cooperation , an educational enterprise and a way of drawing attention to Antarctica and its environmental problems
Mr. Steger , who was more interested in Mr. Qin 's fierce determination to share camp chores and pull his weight in subzero cold
a keen judge of dogs , who share equally in the credit for Trans-Antarctica
a leader of a different stripe : experienced , laid back , determined and flexible
`` Crossing Antarctica '' -LRB- Knopf , 304 pages , $ 25 -RRB- was born of the ambitions of Mr. Steger and Jean-Louis Etienne , who met in 1986 in the middle of separate arctic journeys
the first confirmed unsupported dog-sled expedition to the North Pole
Robert Scott in December and January of 1911-12
a trek that took them from July 27 until March 3
Geoff Somers , stubborn , taciturn and wryly humorous
an expert dog-sled driver and veteran of the British Antarctic Survey
three days in the Minnesota wilderness
Mr. Qin 's first experience with skis , sled dogs or communicating at length in the English language
Those who get into trouble in places like Antarctica , '' he writes , ``
`` A Walk to the Pole '' by Roger Mear and Robert Swan
a news editor in the Journal 's New York bureau
